snippet: The dismissal is the latest change in a tumultuous year for the struggling FM station.
abstract: WBAI, liberal radio station in New York that occupies a powerful spot on the FM dial but has been struggling financially for years, dismisses its latest programming chief Robert Hennelly.
lead_paragraph: The dismissal is the latest change in a tumultuous year for the struggling FM station.

headline.main: WBAI, Still Fighting Deficits, Fires Its Programming Chief
headline.print_headline: WBAI, Fighting Deficits, Fires Programming Chief
